page.title: 18CHARNES ESTATE BROUGHTON
page.content: THE CHARNES ESTATE IS 1567 ACRES,995 IN HAND AND 422 TENANTED.THE 3 TENANT FARMERS FARM AT CHARNES OLD HALL(287 ACRES) FOLLY FARM BROUGHTON(66 ACRES) AND MANOR FARM,FAIROAK (68 ACRES).THE ACRES IN HAND ARE FARMED IN 2 UNITS; RUDGE MANOR FARM(623 ACRES) AND CHARNES HOME FARM(372 ACRES).THESE FARMS CONSIST OF 145 ACRES WOODLAND, 354 ACRES ARABLE AND 640 ACRES GRASSLAND,479 OF WHICH ARE PERMANENT PASTURE.THERE ARE 3 POOLS WHICH COVER 5 ACRES.THERE ARE 15 PEOPLE EMPLOYED BY THE ESTATE.INCLUDED ARE AN ESTATE MANAGER,3 JOINERS,GAMEKEEPER,WAGGONER,WOODMEN,AN D FARMWORKERS.THE FARM EQUIPMENT,GRAIN SILO AND MAIN WORKSHOP IS LOCATED IN THE ESTATE YARD IN WETWOOD,IT IS HERE THAT THE WOOD,HAVING BEEN FELLED AND THEN EXTRACTED WITH THE AID OF A SHIRE CART HORSE IS BROUGHT.
